device_limit_helper: Limit for this device when related device is above related device limit
difference_helper: Do not move device when difference between current and target position is less than this value
icon_helper: Select the icon to be used for the virtual devices
m_descr:
Move devices like windows or blinds based on timing information to a selected position.This module can also ensure that two automation devices operating on the same physical object (ie. window opener and blinds motor mounted on the same window) do not interfere with each other.
Check github.com/maros/Zway-DeviceMove for detailed documentation.
related_check_helper: Check for other devices operating on the same physical object. ie. ensures that a blind cannot be closed above a certain limit if the related window opener has opened the window. Also possible to add binary sensors.
related_device_limit_helper: Constrain current device if the related device is above or below (depending on the comparison operator) the given limit. Binary sensors use 0 and 100 as comparison values. Strict comparison mode will inhibit all device movement (even in the opposite direction) when the related device is above the selected comparison level.
report_helper: Position when the device reports the correct state
step_helper: Sets the steps for moving the device
time_down_helper: Time in seconds to fully close device
time_up_helper: Time in seconds to fully open device
